abstract: meta 2 augmented reality headset now available to businesses through dell .
article: following up on a preview of the deal we reported during last week 's ces , dell has officially announced the details around its role as the first company to resell the meta 2 augmented reality headset . the partnership gives dell an ar offering , alongside its bread and butter pc unit , to sell to its enterprise customers . `` we 're excited about this new partnership with meta and the opportunity to further transform industries with ar , '' said rahul tikoo , the vice president and general manager of the dell precision workstations unit , in a company statement .

`` there continues to be tremendous potential for vr and ar across various industries and in addition to building technology powerful enough for the job , we 're also committed to working with our innovative partners to make ar more comprehensive and accessible for our commercial customers to explore and adopt . `` developing story ... follow next reality on facebook , twitter , instagram , youtube , and flipboard sign up for our new next reality newsletter follow wonderhowto on facebook , twitter , pinterest , and flipboard cover image via meta .
